statements: SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_name, sales_since_last_promotion FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE sales_since_last_promotion > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM slow_moving_stock ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, sales_since_last_promotion FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY sales_since_last_promotion ASC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE product_name = 'Table' ORDER BY current_stock DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, sales_since_last_promotion FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE current_stock > 50 AND sales_since_last_promotion < 20;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE product_name LIKE 'C%' AND current_stock BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, sales_since_last_promotion FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE sales_since_last_promotion IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sales_since_last_promotion DESC;
SELECT MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock, MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock FROM slow_moving_stock;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_stock ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotion_strategies ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, quantity, promotion_name FROM slow_moving_stock LEFT JOIN promotion_strategies ON slow_moving_stock.product_id = promotion_strategies.promotion_id WHERE discount > 0.10 ORDER BY discount ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM slow_moving_stock GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;

SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM promotion_strategies JOIN slow_moving_stock ON promotion_strategies.promotion_id = slow_moving_stock.product_id GROUP BY promotion_id, promotion_name HAVING num_products > 3 ORDER BY num_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT strategy_name, discount, promotion_end_date FROM promotion_strategies WHERE promotion_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM slow_moving_stock ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, movement_type, movement_date FROM slow_moving_stock JOIN stock_movement ON slow_moving_stock.product_id = stock_movement.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotion_strategies WHERE promotion_end_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY discount ASC;

SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM slow_moving_stock JOIN stock_movement ON slow_moving_stock.product_id = stock_movement.product_id WHERE movement_type = 'IN' AND movement_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;

SELECT product_name, quantity, price, movement_type FROM slow_moving_stock JOIN stock_movement ON slow_moving_stock.product_id = stock_movement.product_id WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY movement_date DESC, price ASC;

SELECT promotion_strategies.strategy_name, SUM(slow_moving_stock.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM promotion_strategies JOIN slow_moving_stock ON promotion_strategies.discount <= 0.1 GROUP BY promotion_strategies.strategy_name HAVING total_quantity > 10000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM slow_moving_stock ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, quantity, entry_date FROM stock_history ORDER BY entry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, sale_price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_price FROM slow_moving_stock WHERE last_sale_date < '2021-09-01' AND sale_price > 50.00 ORDER BY sale_price DESC

SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, sale_price FROM slow_moving_stock JOIN stock_history ON slow_moving_stock.product_id = stock_history.product_id WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY entry_date ASC
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2021-11-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC, promotion_id ASC
SELECT s.product_id, s.product_name, s.quantity, sm.sale_price FROM slow_moving_stock s JOIN promotion_stock_mapping psm ON s.product_id = psm.product_id WHERE psm.promotion_id = 1
SELECT * FROM stock_items;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM stock_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT s.name, r.quantity_sold, r.sales_date FROM stock_items s JOIN sales_records r ON s.id = r.item_id;
SELECT * FROM stock_items ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT s.name, p.promotion_name, p.discount FROM stock_items s JOIN promotion_strategy ps ON s.id = ps.target_stock_id JOIN promotions p ON ps.promotion_id = p.promotion_id;
SELECT s.name AS item_name, sm.days_on_shelf AS shelf_days FROM stock_items s JOIN slow_moving_stock sm ON s.id = sm.item_id WHERE sm.days_on_shelf > 30;
SELECT ps.strategy_name, p.promotion_name, s.name AS target_stock FROM promotion_strategy ps JOIN promotions p ON ps.promotion_id = p.promotion_id JOIN stock_items s ON ps.target_stock_id = s.id;
